entry.title: Are you an android/java develoepr? Must check out the following libraries
entry.content:
There are some libraries which may be useful for you and can save tons of time :)

  • Clorabase/ClorastoreDB
    Clorastore is the world's 2nd easiest document-oriented NoSQL database followed by the CloremDB for Android. This is similar to Cloud Firestore and MongoDB and is written in Java.

  • Clorabase/CloremDB
    Clorem is a Fast, easy-2-use and robust No-SQL database for java applications in which data is stored directly as objects. This is the world's easiest database ever made in Java and is similar to that of the mongoDB realm.

  • Clorabase/ClorpgraphDB
    Clorograph is an embedded NoSQL graph database by Clorabase for Java apps. It comes with flexible data models, like graphs and trees. Build giant network using this database with it's easy syntax

  • ModernOnboarding
    An android library to implement Walkthrough / Introduction / OnBoarding screen to your app. Make your app cool using this library

  • EasyInsta
    A Java library of Instagram's private API and wrapper of instagram4j. Surf Instagram programmatically, build bots, and a lot more. It's just a line of code for every operation.

  • Clorine
    A simple, powerful, and multipurpose Java caching library with both memory and disk persisting ability. Save your POJO's directly in the cache

To get notified about such great libraries, follow @ErrorxCode or explore my all repositories
entry.summary: There are some libraries which may be useful for you and can save tons of time :)- [Clorabase/Clora...

entry.title: j'aimerai cree une application de messagerie un peu comme whatsapp
entry.content:
Application de messagerie Web

conteneur { largeur : 80 % ; marge : 0 automatique ; }

header { couleur d'arrière-plan : #0066cc ; remplissage : 10 px ; alignement du texte : centre ; couleur : #ffffff ; }

message-container { couleur d'arrière-plan : #ffffff ; remplissage : 10 px ; bordure : 1px solide #ccc ; rayon de bordure : 5 px ; marge supérieure : 10 px ; }

messages { hauteur : 300px ; bordure : 1px solide #ccc ; rayon de bordure : 5 px ; remplissage : 10 px ; overflow-y : défilement ; }

message-input {largeur : 70 % ; hauteur : 100px ; redimensionner : vertical ; remplissage : 10 px ; bordure : 1px solide #ccc ; rayon de bordure : 5 px ; marge droite : 10 px ; }

bouton de formulaire de message { couleur d'arrière-plan : #cc0000 ; couleur : #ffffff ; remplissage : 10 px ; bordure : aucune ; rayon de bordure : 5 px ; curseur : pointeur ; }

bouton de formulaire de message : survoler { couleur d'arrière-plan : #990000 ; }

{ e.preventDefault(); const messageText = messageInput.value; if (messageText.trim()) { const message = document.createElement('div'); message. textContent = messageText; message.classList.add('message'); messages.appendChild(message); messageInput.value = ''; } });
